\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 THE FACILITY POLICY: The owners, man}{\fs20\insrsid6169375\charrsid7210874 agers, and employees of Trenton }{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 Cooperative Equity Exchange are committed to the pre
vention of any accidental releases }{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 of anhydrous}{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 
 ammonia by utilization of proper equipment, regular inspections, and maintenance and training of all persons that work with the materials.
\par }\pard \ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\tqc\tx180\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid7210874 {\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 \tab       }{\fs20\insrsid1139090  }{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 \tab }{
\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 Should an accidental release occur, the facility has orientated the }{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 local fire}{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874  }{\fs20\insrsid7210874 \tab    \tab        \tab         }{
\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 Department and the local emergency plan}{\fs20\insrsid7210874 ning committee so they can plan}{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874  }{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 for Response }{\fs20\insrsid7210874 \tab 
\tab         }{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 to any release and

minimize the }{\fs20\insrsid7210874 impact of the release to people }{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 and the }{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 environment?}{
\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 
\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 2.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-720\li1080\ri0\widctlpar\tqc\tx180\jclisttab\tx1080\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin1080\itap0\pararsid7210874 {
\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 FACILITY INFORMATION: The primary activity at the facility }{\fs20\insrsid6169375\charrsid7210874 a}{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 s the}{\fs20\insrsid7210874  }{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 
storage for sale to farmers. Anhydrous Ammonia is received, stored, and distributed for direct application as a crop production nutrient. The }{\fs20\insrsid7210874 maximum }{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874 quantity stored would be }{
\fs20\insrsid491052 78000}{\fs20\insrsid9448620\charrsid7210874  pounds in the facility\rquote s storage tank.}{\fs20\insrsid6169375\charrsid7210874 
\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid6169375\charrsid7210874 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 3.\tab}The wor
st-case release scenario would be the release of the total contents of the storage tank release as a gas over 10 minutes. The maximum quantity released would be }{\fs20\insrsid491052 78000}{\fs20\insrsid6169375\charrsid7210874 
 pounds, which represents the volume of the storage tank at 85% capacity as limited by design standar}{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 ds and company procedures. The }{\fs20\insrsid6169375\charrsid7210874 
distance to the endpoint of dispersion based on the model used is 1.16 miles.
\par }\pard \ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\tqc\tx180\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin0\itap0\pararsid7210874 {\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 \tab \tab }{\fs20\insrsid7210874         }{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 
The Alternative-case release scenario is assumed to

be a release from the \tab    \tab       }{\fs20\insrsid7210874 \tab \tab \tab        }{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 rupture of a 2 inch line, with 12000 pounds released over 2 minutes.  The 
\tab         }{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 \tab       }{\fs20\insrsid7210874 \tab \tab \tab        }{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 distance to the endpoint of dispersion is .56 miles.
\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 4.\tab}}\pard \ql \fi-720\li1080\ri0\widctlpar\tqc\tx180\jclisttab\tx1080\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\ls1\adjustright\rin0\lin1080\itap0\pararsid7210874 {
\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 THE ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PROGRAM:  The facility complies with the \tab        rules and Regulations relating to the handling of Anhydrous Ammonia and Low Pressure Nitrogen Solution, Equipment, Containers and Storage}{
\fs20\insrsid7210874  }{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 Facilities.  These regulations administere}{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 d by the Illinois Department of}{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874  Agriculture are }{
\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 consistent}{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874  with ANSI K61}{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 .1 and OSHA 29CFR 1910.111}{\fs20\insrsid1315789\charrsid7210874   regarding storage and handling of anhy
drous ammonia.}{\fs20\insrsid12732797\charrsid7210874 
\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid1315789\charrsid7210874 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 5.\tab}}{\fs20\insrsid1315789\charrsid7210874 
THE FIVE YEAR ACCIDENT HISTORY: There have been no accidental releases of anhydrous ammonia for the covered process in the past five years that have caused any deaths, injuries, or significant property damage on sit nor to our knowledge, hav
e any accidental releases resulted in off site deaths, injuries, evacuations, sheltering in place, property damage or environmental damage.
\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid

1315789\charrsid7210874 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 6.\tab}THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM:  The facility has a written emergency action plan in accordance with OSHA standard 2
9CFR 1910.38 and provide state and local authorities the emergency planning and community right-to know information as required under SARA Title III of EPCRA. Our emergency response action plan has been reviewed with the local fire department and provide 
to }{\fs20\insrsid7023181 the local emergency planning com}{\fs20\insrsid7023181\charrsid7210874 mittee}{\fs20\insrsid1315789\charrsid7210874  for coordination in the community response planning.
\par {\listtext\pard\plain\fs20\insrsid1315789\charrsid7210874 \hich\af0\dbch\af0\loch\f0 7.\tab}PLANNED CHANGES TO IMPROVE SAFETY: }{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 Safety improvements are}{\fs20\insrsid1315789\charrsid7210874 
 an on-going process at the facility}{\fs20\insrsid7210874\charrsid7210874 .  Periodic evaluations are performed to assess the maintenance of s
afe practices and operations.  There are no additional specific anhydrous ammonia Safety recommendations for implementation at }{\insrsid7210874 this time.}{\insrsid1315789 
\par }\pard \ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\tqc\tx180\aspalpha\aspnum\faauto\adjustright\rin0\lin0\itap0\pararsid12680610 {\insrsid12680610
